name: intgr-eip.yml
configuration:
spring:
  jmx:
    default-domain: nttm-eip-jmx
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-eip
  rabbitmq:
    host: 10.28.97.89
    username: admin
    password: admin
    note_queue: eip_notes
    done_queue: eip_done
    pause_queue: eip_pause
    response_queue: eip_response
    template:
      exchange: integrations
external-system: eip
server:
  port: 8284
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://localhost:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
nttm:
  auth:
    sourceSystem:
      4:
        username: lk_intgr
        password: 123456
      8:
        username: uus_intgr
        password: 123456
      9:
        username: lko_intgr
        password: 123456
      10:
        username: pochta_intgr
        password: 123456
      11:
        username: kazna_intgr
        password: 123456
  prefix: "http://10.28.97.89:8080"
  sourceSystemCatalog: cat_source_system
  closeValue: "Закрыт"
  defaultProcessName: "ttm_rule2"
  tt:
    maxReturn: 1000
  tasks:
    types:
      registrationTypeId: 1
      diagTypeId: 2
      autoCloseTypeId: 6 # подтверждение клиентом
      clientConfirmTypeId: 6
      waitingTaskTypeId: 21
      incidentCloseTypeId: 7
    codes:
      termCloseCodesId:  30, 36, 84
      reOpenCloseCodeId: 84
    statuses:
      workStatusId: 3
      queueStatusId: 2
      sourceSystemId : 4
eip:
  url: http://10.28.101.120/core/post-adapter/nttm-facade/tickets
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
